parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> In a nutshell, this command removes gaming [[Side]] (see [[createCenter]]). If a side has >0 [[Group]]s it cannot be deleted. Center can only be created for: [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]] and [[sideLogic]], therefore only centers from the mentioned sides can be deleted.<br><br>
'''Old description:''' Destroys the AI center of the given side.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''deleteCenter''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[deleteCenter]] [[east]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createCenter]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
